languages.text: {n}Перед вами возвышается гора помоев, рядом с которой стоят ржавые вилы. Взгляд притягивает что-то бледно-розовое, наполовину скрытое под ботвой. Оно подозрительно похоже на чью-то конечность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Перед вами возвышается гора помоев, рядом с которой стоят ржавые вилы. Взгляд притягивает что-то бледно-розовое, наполовину скрытое под ботвой. Оно подозрительно похоже на чью-то конечность.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A mountain of vegetable waste rises up ahead, next to which stands a rusty pitchfork. Your attention is drawn to something pale pink, half-buried under the waste and looking suspiciously like a limb.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Перед вами возвышается гора помоев, рядом с которой стоят ржавые вилы. Взгляд притягивает что-то бледно-розовое, наполовину скрытое под ботвой. Оно подозрительно похоже на чью-то конечность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A mountain of vegetable waste rises up ahead, next to which stands a rusty pitchfork. Your attention is drawn to something pale pink, half-buried under the waste and looking suspiciously like a limb.{/n}

{n}Maive's slight body slips through the fence with ease. A mountain of vegetable waste rises up ahead, next to which stands a rusty pitchfork. Your attention is drawn to something pale pink, half-buried under the waste and looking suspiciously like a limb.{/n}

{n}Lidzy's slight body slips through the fence with ease. A disgusting mountain of flesh rises up ahead, next to which stands a pitchfork: the stable hand is using it to move the meat. Your attention is drawn to the female body lying closest to the edge of the pile. It looks almost elegant. An embroidered handkercher peeks out from beneath the bodice of her dress.{/n}

{n}A mountain of vegetable waste rises up ahead, next to which stands a rusty pitchfork. Your attention is drawn to something pale pink, half-buried under the waste and looking suspiciously like a limb.{/n}

{n}A mountain of vegetable waste rises up ahead, next to which stands a rusty pitchfork. Your attention is drawn to something pale pink, half-buried under the waste and looking suspiciously like a limb.{/n}

{n}A mountain of vegetable waste rises up ahead, next to which stands a rusty pitchfork. Your attention is drawn to something pale pink, half-buried under the waste and looking suspiciously like a limb.{/n}

{n}Maive's slight body slips through the fence with ease. A mountain of vegetable waste rises up ahead, next to which stands a rusty pitchfork. Your attention is drawn to something pale pink, half-buried under the waste and looking suspiciously like a limb.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你前面是一座厨余垃圾山，旁边立着一把生锈的干草叉。某个淡粉色的东西引起了你的注意。它半埋在垃圾山下面，看起来很可疑，似乎是某个人的手臂。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A mountain of vegetable waste rises up ahead, next to which stands a rusty pitchfork. Your attention is drawn to something pale pink, half-buried under the waste and looking suspiciously like a limb.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你前面是一座厨余垃圾山，旁边立着一把生锈的干草叉。某个淡粉色的东西引起了你的注意。它半埋在垃圾山下面，看起来很可疑，似乎是某个人的手臂。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Más adelante se eleva una montaña de verduras podridas, y junto a ella hay una horca herrumbrosa. Tu atención se centra en algo de color rosa pálido medio sepultado bajo los restos; guarda un sospechoso parecido con una extremidad humana.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A mountain of vegetable waste rises up ahead, next to which stands a rusty pitchfork. Your attention is drawn to something pale pink, half-buried under the waste and looking suspiciously like a limb.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Más adelante se eleva una montaña de verduras podridas, y junto a ella hay una horca herrumbrosa. Tu atención se centra en algo de color rosa pálido medio sepultado bajo los restos; guarda un sospechoso parecido con una extremidad humana.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Önünde bir sebze artığı dağı yükselirken yanında da paslı bir dirgen duruyor. Dikkatin, atığın altına yarı gömülmüş ve şüpheli bir şekilde bir uzva benzeyen soluk pembe bir şeye çekiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A mountain of vegetable waste rises up ahead, next to which stands a rusty pitchfork. Your attention is drawn to something pale pink, half-buried under the waste and looking suspiciously like a limb.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Önünde bir sebze artığı dağı yükselirken yanında da paslı bir dirgen duruyor. Dikkatin, atığın altına yarı gömülmüş ve şüpheli bir şekilde bir uzva benzeyen soluk pembe bir şeye çekiliyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}野菜のゴミの山が前に積まれており、その隣に錆びた熊手が立てかけてある。あなたの注意は、淡いピンク色の何かに引かれる。それは半分がゴミの下に埋まっており、手足のように見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A mountain of vegetable waste rises up ahead, next to which stands a rusty pitchfork. Your attention is drawn to something pale pink, half-buried under the waste and looking suspiciously like a limb.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴの細い体は簡単にフェンスの間をすり抜ける。野菜のゴミの山が前に積まれており、その隣に錆びた熊手が立てかけてある。あなたの注意は、淡いピンク色の何かに引かれる。それは半分がゴミの下に埋まっており、手足のように見える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}À côté de la montagne de déchets végétaux, vous apercevez une fourche, mais quelque chose d'autre attire votre attention, un objet rose pâle à moitié enfoui sous les ordures et qui ressemble étrangement à un membre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A mountain of vegetable waste rises up ahead, next to which stands a rusty pitchfork. Your attention is drawn to something pale pink, half-buried under the waste and looking suspiciously like a limb.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À côté de la montagne de déchets végétaux, vous apercevez une fourche, mais quelque chose d'autre attire votre attention, un objet rose pâle à moitié enfoui sous les ordures et qui ressemble étrangement à un membre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Berg von Gemüseabfällen erhebt sich vor dir. Unmittelbar daneben steht eine rostige Mistgabel. Dir springt etwas ins Auge, das halb unter den Abfällen vergraben ist und verdächtig nach einer Gliedmaße aussieht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A mountain of vegetable waste rises up ahead, next to which stands a rusty pitchfork. Your attention is drawn to something pale pink, half-buried under the waste and looking suspiciously like a limb.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Ein Berg von Gemüseabfällen erhebt sich vor dir. Unmittelbar daneben steht eine rostige Mistgabel. Dir springt etwas ins Auge, das halb unter den Abfällen vergraben ist und verdächtig nach einer Gliedmaße aussieht.{/n}
